db528845-66b3-46c8-8a7b-0c3da9e7ff2b.name: 执念
db528845-66b3-46c8-8a7b-0c3da9e7ff2b.notes: Become the best  swordsman in the world!

b9e94123-dea0-44b4-9847-6bf4dae481d6.name: Vow (Never refuse a challenge to combat)

4a54e715-6572-40fe-96a0-0b2bf8e65ed5.name: 战斗反射
4a54e715-6572-40fe-96a0-0b2bf8e65ed5.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

f605efc0-4ae6-4ac6-9442-baa8299b2888.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

863587ce-5561-425a-8eb9-6e2b6d4de6b3.name: 幸运
863587ce-5561-425a-8eb9-6e2b6d4de6b3.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

a3077a41-86af-4481-8048-4f0354fc0433.name: Weapon Bond
a3077a41-86af-4481-8048-4f0354fc0433.notes: +1 to effective skill when using @a specific weapon@

076d9d0a-5437-4a0c-bddb-e8a1922b0b98.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

f5c7180e-6d5d-461c-8b98-8fbad1abbead.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

1305c275-a228-4d36-a5b0-7195331a53d0.name: 健康
1305c275-a228-4d36-a5b0-7195331a53d0.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

731d8f5d-12ba-410e-ba2e-453aaee8eaa9.name: Fit, Very
731d8f5d-12ba-410e-ba2e-453aaee8eaa9.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

525e9d0d-17d9-4e37-a670-936c5036a554.name: Luck, Extraordinary
525e9d0d-17d9-4e37-a670-936c5036a554.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

431d2e02-5d8b-4bae-82b2-d1ab07f582c7.name: 标志性装备
431d2e02-5d8b-4bae-82b2-d1ab07f582c7.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

e1e48b38-b78a-46c7-959a-791e78edcb5c.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

d97b8ebf-8662-44d7-892d-3988c827f480.name: Or 1 point to raise one of those skills or any one-point primary or secondary skill by a level.
